characters.description: White sedan car driving in the same direction as the ego vehicle.
characters.location: Center lane, ahead of the ego vehicle.

characters.description: Yellow and blue taxi driving in the same direction as the ego vehicle.
characters.location: Center lane, ahead of the ego vehicle.

characters.description: Black sedan car driving in the same direction as the ego vehicle.
characters.location: Left lane, ahead of the ego vehicle.

characters.description: A man riding a white electric bicycle, wearing a black jacket, crossing the street from left to right.
characters.location: Left side of the road, crossing the street.

characters.description: Two women standing on the right side of the road, near a red food stall, waiting to cross the street. One is wearing a white jacket and the other is wearing a black jacket.
characters.location: Right side of the road, near a red food stall.

characters.description: A red three-wheeled vehicle is parked on the right side of the road.
characters.location: Right side of the road, parked.

summary: The ego vehicle is driving on a city street with moderate traffic. A white sedan, a yellow and blue taxi, and a black sedan are driving ahead in the same direction. A man on a white electric bicycle is crossing the street from left to right. Two women are standing on the right side of the road, near a red food stall, waiting to cross the street. The man on the bicycle is a potential ghost probing hazard as he crosses the street.
actions: The ego vehicle is maintaining a steady speed, following the flow of traffic. The driver is likely adjusting speed to maintain a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The vehicle is driving straight, following the lane markings.
key_objects: Left side: Man on a white electric bicycle, approximately 15 meters away, crossing the street, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate or stop.
